website_summaries.verdict: An exceedingly popular option for buyers who need a bubble mask at an affordable price.
pros: Many buyers raved over this mask's ability to completely rid the face of blackheads
Doesn't stain cloth used for removal
Mask is remarkably bubbly compared to other bubble mask products

website_summaries.verdict: Charcoal helps cleanse pores of environmental toxins and dirt.
pros: Leaves skin feeling tight, smooth, and soft immediately after use
Removes excess oil  and dissolves impurities
cons: Not the best choice for severe acne

customer_reviews.title: Made my boyfriend's blackheads disappear!
customer_reviews.text: Literally made my boyfriend's blackheads disappear! I wasn't so lucky but his were really bad. Made our faces feel so clean. I'm a mask junkie and have gotten masks from all the top brands both drugstore, lush, and sephora or ulta. This is one of my new favorites! Also so much fun to watch it buddy's up, feels like a spa treaatment.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Not worth my money
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why such high reviews. This product is USELESS. I was expecting it to foam much more than it actually did. Furthermore, it was SO troublesome to get off. Go light on the application. I obviously must have layered on too much . I will give a second try again without going overboard on the application. Also quite jarring is the presence of "Sodium Lauryl Sulfate" as an ingredient in this product !! Known to be a skin irritant that can damage skin . I almost don't even want to give this a second try. Am debating .
customer_reviews.author: S.T.

customer_reviews.title: My skin is not sensitive skin. but after apply ...
customer_reviews.text: My skin is not sensitive skin. but after apply this mask, I feel so harsh and itch. I washed out after 5 minutes, my skin became so red.
customer_reviews.author: Eundaeng

customer_reviews.title: Cute/fun novelty with a practical use
customer_reviews.text: This is really fun to use, no lie. It's really easy to apply and take off. But it does not work as well as a normal clay mask does. Let's be real, it's mostly just for the novelty. You need much less than you would imagine though, which is nice as it makes me feel like I'm getting more for my buck. (even though I know its in my head!) This would be awesome for kids to use along with mom/dad as a fun "spa" moment and is less expensive than some of the more adult clay masks. But if you are looking to revolutionize your skin, this ain't it.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Chemically burned my face
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't review stuff but I purchased this after reading all the highly rated reviews - this stuff burned my face, after I took it off I had raw areas of my face that hurt and blotchy areas. I went back and read some reviews and some suggested that this product is expired - that'd explain the cheapness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun and works
customer_reviews.text: Works nicely. Light pleasant scent and gentle. Not too harsh. I tried it, and I tried it on my tween, who has developed some blackhead problems. Worked very well on my pores. With the tween, just one use shows some improvement, especially on small pores. We’ll need to use a few more times to see if it clears pores completely. It’s a fun product, which means she’s more likely to use it and get those benefits, so I rate it higher than standard mud masks. It seems to work well with no negative effects. We will definitely keep using it and see how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: AnthroMom

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask, it is extremely simple and fun- as well as non-abrasive or burning for sensitive skin as far as I have witnessed at this point. I find it perfect to use when sharing products at sleepovers or makeover events, as it works on any skin type to clean and moisturize with a fun twist to the process added! I would recommend to almost anyone, as I feel it is an entertaining and cute idea as well as actual helpful and nice quality self-care item, for the price.
customer_reviews.author: hobbyist & cosplayer (anime merch collector, mainly)

customer_reviews.title: Novelty
customer_reviews.text: I try to stay away from novelty korean skincare, but I finally caved and bought this one. The first time I used it, it didn't bubble at all. I thought I had a defective product. After reading some reviews, I put on a very thin layer the second time. I finally got the bubbles and have had them every time since. The mask does clean your face but not as thoroughly as other clay masks I've tried. it's a fun product (I actually like the tingly sensation) and I will use up the jar, but I probably won't repurchase. For the price, though, it would make a good gift or stocking stuffer.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Arrived already open and leaking - definitely not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This container had spilled out into the lid. The seal was broken....the top layer of mask was already activated and bubbled all over. Such a mess. Despite all of these disappointments. I decided to try the mask anyway. It was easy to spread, immediately began bubbling, have to work quickly to get it on. After, my skin felt tighter and my nose looked clearer...that's about it. Will NOT buy this again. Great as a novelty item for a silly girls night or something but, I wish I wasn't so excited to try it out...severely disappointed and I hope that wasn't a USED TUB!?!
customer_reviews.author: jessB

customer_reviews.title: This makes my skin look very clear & flawless.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is kind of a pain to put on and take off, but the results are worth it. Every time i use this, it clears up all my acne and makes my skin look flawless. The day after i use it people always ask me if i’m wearing makeup when i’m not. It’s that great. The spreading tool it comes with is horrible, so you’re better off using a liquid foundation brush. I will buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: More for use at sleepover or fun spa night
customer_reviews.text: I love the feeling this mask has on your skin. You can literally feel the bubbles forming and fizzing on your skin. I have sensitive skin and this hasn't caused me any irritation at all. It is not moisturizing.. skin feels tighter right after rinsing the product off. I bought this thinking the fizzing action would really clean deep down in to my pores ( I have combination/oily skin) I have tried leaving it on different time periods but Everytime I rinse it off, I can still squeeze gunk out of my pores so to me, it bubbles on the surface and feels fun but is not deep cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm not recommending this product.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to order this. So, when I received it, my mom happened to be at my house and we did it together. The first time I used it, it was fine. The next day I had a bad reaction to it. My face started to burn horribly. It was red, hot, and burned so bad. I washed my face. I used face cream. I tried ice. Anything to relieve the pain, but to no avail. It's now been 2 days, and my face still hurts. If anyone uses this, just please be careful. On the upside, it was quite funny watching the bubbles.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hollier

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I’m not one to write reviews, but this product warrants a review. It goes on smooth and cool. When it starts to foam it tickles like crazy, but not uncomfortably. It becomes velvety when massaged into the skin and rinses away easily. It leaves the skin feeling smooth and clean. It also had a pleasant scent. I will be recommending this product to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Jaro

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin that is prone to breaking out and cleansers tend to aggravate it. I’ve been using microfiber cloths with water to cleanse my skin on most days which has really helped it out, however, using this product in combination with this routine has helped keep my skin super clean without stripping it. I really like it. I advise one to scoop out a generous amount of the mask and quickly apply it to your skin for the best foaming effect. If you are slow, the product doesn’t foam like it should. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR ACNE
customer_reviews.text: Ok guys, I was looking for a mask for my acne but most of them either make it worse or just make my skin wet haha but this one is great. Leaves my skin feeling moisturized, and dare I say that it’s helped my skin be less oily overall?! I have combo skin(but it’s way more oily than dry) so try this out! Just slow down with it once it clears your skin because I found that using it when my skin is happy makes it’s a little too moist aka a good place for those little pin sized whiteheads to form.
customer_reviews.author: KatelynYasemin

customer_reviews.title: Not really Impressed
customer_reviews.text: It was a little hard to open. It did was it says and it bubbles up. It's a fun idea. The reality is that it burned my face as soon as I put it on. But my daughter used it too and had no problems with burning. My face is a little more sensitive I guess. It was hard to wash off. It took forever it get off. It did make our skin really soft so that's a plus. My daughter skin was fine. She's 11. My skin however broke out after using this product. So I would not but this again.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING! Must have.
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask! If you have oily skin with a bunch of blemishes, and or sores from picking at your face, this mask works wonders! The bubbling sensation on my face tickles because the little bubbles pop and there is a very light burning sensation from the chemicals working and cleaning your pores. It’s a very subtle sensation but it reassures you that the mask is working. And it makes you look funny when it puffs up all the way. This mask is amazing and it’s a must have for every skin type honestly!
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie S.

customer_reviews.title: Good fun, soft skin
customer_reviews.text: So I've only used this once, but I am just loving it. After foaming and bubbling in my face for about three minutes, my skin feels baby soft. My only complaint: the fizziness actually tickles! It became a challenge to keep it on my face--ordinarily I'd leave it on the full five minutes, but I just couldn't take it. But the effects are undeniable, and my sensitive skin doesn't feel the least bit irritated. I think this will be a fun thing to do with kids, too. I may have a contest to see who can keep it on her face the longest... The fragrance is very light and inoffensive--important for a product applied to the face.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Goldman

customer_reviews.title: Part of my Sunday beauty ritual
customer_reviews.text: This is a part of my Sunday beauty ritual. I am asian with oily/pimple-prone skin and sometimes gets adult acne, that's why I'm a little hesistant to try this or any other korean skincare for that matter. I'm so glad I tried this though (and even researched and started the 10-step Korean skincare) because It really makes my skin soft and smooth, even some little bumps that are threatening to come out as pimples due to clogged pores will suddenly vanish after using this. It is a little messy if you are not careful in applying it, you also have to apply it fast enough to cover your entire face before it starts to bubble up (or carbonate?).
customer_reviews.author: shevicre

customer_reviews.title: Stops bubbling after 2nd use
customer_reviews.text: it's super fun to use the first time around, it bubbles up and makes you look like Squidward from that one episode of SpongeBob where he was all foamy. it's super funny and we'll give you a lot of giggles around your house, it makes your skin feel kind of good, but it's mostly novelty. I used it two times, and then it stopped foaming, probably due to oxygen exposure, but they should make way less in the package if it's going to do that and lower the price
customer_reviews.author: Quinn M.

customer_reviews.title: Ideal product for oily/combination skin but fun for everyone!
customer_reviews.text: Super fun and foams like crazy compared to any other bubble mask I've tried on the market. It is a clay mask though so keep that in mind if you have sensitive/dry skin as clay mask soak up oils which usually dry/tighten your face. It leaves your face feelings soft but if you're like me and feel a little dry afterwards it's nothing a dab of face oil can't fix! This product also foams when exposed to air so be mindful when applying to close the lid in-between scoops and to completely cap when done!
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask. It cracks me up every time I use it. I don't use it more than twice a month because clay can be rather drying, so I still have plenty of it left after purchasing it in 2017. It's 2019 now, and let me tell you that I still love it and will reorder it. It smells nice, and the effect of it is hilarious. My husband, sons, and dog all avoid me when I have it on because they can't stand the sight of me frothing and oozing and laughing all at the same time. But my skin after I wash it off is simply divine. It's so baby soft and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Am Azon Woman

customer_reviews.title: Tickle torture
customer_reviews.text: Not for me. First time trying a bubbling mask. It tickled and was torture not to touch my face. When I couldn’t take the tickling anymore, it was actually harder to wash off than I’d expected. Stays very muddy beneath the bubbles. Used once and threw it away BUT I’ll admit that it was my first time trying something like this and it’s just not my cup of tea.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Death by a thousand needles
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if I love or hate this product. As someone who has been tattooed, needles don’t bother me. This is more like 1000 needles just slightly irritating the sling until you can’t take it anymore. I can only keep this mask on 10 minutes tops. It works, but the price may be your very soul.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: The smell is really unpleasant and I had a terrible reaction to this mask
customer_reviews.text: The smell is really unpleasant and I had a terrible reaction to this mask. My skin felt like it was burning after I washed it off and for the rest of the night. Not happy but can’t return, gonna toss it.
customer_reviews.author: Jrcheeseburgerdeluxe

customer_reviews.title: The Best Product for My Face!
customer_reviews.text: I have an oily face and usually prodcuts will cut down the oils and then the next day the oils come right back. This product is different though. After one use I felt my skin feeling soft and tamed. After one week of using this product the oils on my face were under control! When using this product you use a spoon (it comes with it) to place the product on your face and then wait for it to bubble up. After some time passes you wash it off and you’re ready to start your day. I love this product and can’t wait to buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: It bubbles!
customer_reviews.text: The mask does what it’s supposed to do...it bubbles! It has a tingling sensation but not a burning. I only gave it 4 stars because I purchased this simply to try for fun and wont be using on a regular basis so I can’t speak to long-term benefits. I have dry skin so a charcoal product is not best for me to use on a regular basis but it did dry me up so I’m guessing this would be good weekly for someone with oily skin.
customer_reviews.author: NikkiMarieC

customer_reviews.title: Skip It
customer_reviews.text: This product got a lot of hype for great Korean skincare products but honestly, there are much better products on the market. I think it's primary value was in its weird/cool effect when it bubbled up. I personally did not find this bubbling to be effective. Rather, it came off as rather gimmicky. There are much better and cheaper products that pull the gunk out of your pores.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Oleksyshyn

customer_reviews.title: Great at first
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this product, it exceeded my expectations. Left it on for 5 minutes, rubbed it in and let it sit for an additional minute and most of my blackheads around my nose were gone. However, the mask has become less and less effective with time. I was quite anal about only using the spatula to dispense product as to not get any oils into the container, and keeping it sealed tightly. I understand that products like this will eventually expire, but this did so in only two months.
customer_reviews.author: mitec

customer_reviews.title: I am very annoyed with this product
customer_reviews.text: I am very annoyed with this product. I wanted to love it and was so excited about all of the reviews however when I received this product it was already half fluffed and the consistency of separate piecy-ness. I have looked at the packaging and noticed no cracks however I am convinced that before I received this it had been exposed to air for a long time. I tried to apply this to my face and it just falls right off. I would really like to try this product again however probably won't due to the inability to return and scared that I would get the same product quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: Our family likes to do odd things, so we tried this mask together... It goes on cold and then fizzes... Kind of interesting sensation. My wife and daughter have sensitive skin and were worried this product would cause them to break out and fortunately it did not. Kind of difficult to wash off in the sink, the shower would have been easier. Give it a try and post your own "cloud" pics =)
customer_reviews.author: Dr. John M. Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: What a fun mask!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a little pick-me-up during stay-at-home orders. What's better than looking ridiculous with your spouse to raise the spirits?!?! It has a little spatula under the lid, which makes scooping the mask out easy. We applied the mask, and let the fun begin! It took some effort to wash off, but my skin was smooooooth afterwards. I'd highly recommend this, especially for the fun factor :)
customer_reviews.author: Yvette H

customer_reviews.title: Super fun, works great, however...
customer_reviews.text: Just be warned, don't wear white while wearing this. I thought since it was still a clay mask, it would wash off like one. It has the same texture, but once water hits the bubbles it starts to lather A LOT. Obviously this is just user error, so I'm not complaining. The mask itself is super fun to use, and it leaves my skin feeling super tight. I wouldn't say it's moisturizing, so def need a moisturizer afterwards, but it leaves me feeling super clean.
customer_reviews.author: Crimé

customer_reviews.title: Funny & entertaining, but not too functional.
customer_reviews.text: No instructions in English (at least that I could find on the packaging or container). Kind of had to figure this out on my own, which of course, there's always YouTube, but usually I don't watch tutorials while I'm trying to clean my face... haha. It could be that it's user error, but I wasn't really impressed with this mask. It's fun and it's kitschy, but not really big on a wow-factor in terms of performance.
customer_reviews.author: lovendestroy

customer_reviews.title: It was really good at first
customer_reviews.text: I loved this mask at the beginning since it left my face feeling really clean afterwards...changed my mind when the product started to REALLY SMELL after a few months. I couldn't even leave it on my face because the smell was too much to handle, I had to throw it away! The expiration date is 2020 too...
customer_reviews.author: t-izzle

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't bubble
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't bubble, which going into buying it I knew there was a chance it wouldn't since I saw mixed reviews but I figured I'd try it anyway. Even though it doesn't bubble I still figured it was still a face mask so I won't mind using it anyway. When I went to wash it off, it was a pain in the butt to get off my face. My face feels nice, and I don't think the mask itself is going to cause any problems to my skin, it's just not a bubbling face mask like advertised!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Swenson

customer_reviews.title: crazy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This mask is a pretty amazing. It's carbonated! You put it on like you would a regular mask, and as it sits on your face, it starts to tingle, and you can hear little fizzy sounds. The longer it sits, and the longer is fizzes, the thicker it gets on your face. It tickles!! I have found that after it puffs out to over a half inch, you can either wash it off at that point, but I have found that if you just rub it in again, it starts the process all over. My granddaughters would use this every time they were over. I got them their own jar, and they love it
customer_reviews.author: Tamara S. Harden

customer_reviews.title: Soft skin + Fun
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this mask. I've gotten 5 uses out of it and it isn't yet half gone. The smell is nice, the carbonation tickles a bit but no burning or pulsing, and it comes off easy. My skin is very soft afterwards. I've been using this as my fall back mask since it's nice and gentle, and doesn't cost an arm and a leg. I will say, this doesn't get my pores as clean as others but the benefits I mentioned above make it an ok trade off for me. Also my kids get a kick out of my "puffy" face.
customer_reviews.author: MRB

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I am not sure about this mask. For starters, the instructions are in Korean, so I had to google how to use it. ( you only put it on for 5 minutes at a time) It looks really cool when it bubbles, but it did not really affect my face. However, I did buy some for my roommate as a gift, and she loves it!! She uses it all the time, and said that it makes her face more vibrant and soft for a few days after. So it works for some people, and it does not work for others. It does look really cool though when it bubbles up! and it tickles a little too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: The most fun I've ever had with a mask. It bubbles and feels great. I don't know if I'd want too many people to see me with this on - some areas bubble way more than others so your face looks very comical. The last time I did the mask I took selfies and sent to my granddaughter (she's 21) and cracked her up. It washes off with a warm wash cloth and my face does feel great after.
customer_reviews.author: ButtonsTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: HEEE BUBBLES
customer_reviews.text: This foams up like crazy. Just when you think it’s done, it doubles in size. Yeah, you now look like you got a bad case of face mold, and it tickles the entire time, and you’ll go marginally insane trying not to scratch, but HEEE BUBBLE FACE MONSTER HEEE. Be sure to use the included spatula to spread it evenly: makes life much easier. Oh, and go easy applying it on your upper lip. The foam will shoot right up your nose, and then you’ll sneeze, and all the foamy mud fluff will go flying everywhere. Trust me.
customer_reviews.author: HG

customer_reviews.title: I love this mud mask
customer_reviews.text: I love this mud mask! When my friends and I have girls nights at my house this is our go to mud mask! It is so much fun to put on and watch the mask interact with your skin! It also works really well of pulling all the embedded dirt in your face up to the surface. Don't be alarmed if the next day after you put the mask on you start breaking out, it will clear out the next couple of days and you will be left with beautiful baby soft skin!
customer_reviews.author: Mae polancos

customer_reviews.title: Amazeballs
customer_reviews.text: My favorite skin care purchase so far! This stuff works perfectly. I don’t have very sensitive skin anyway but didn’t have any adverse reaction to this (no burning or tingling, just tickled a little). My skin has been glowing since I started using it! I’m using it about two times per week. It is kind of difficult to wash off but it’s worth it, just use a warm washcloth. If you’re curious, BUY IT NOW! It’s a steal!
customer_reviews.author: BaileyElf

customer_reviews.title: It was fun
customer_reviews.text: It was a lot of fun to use, but I’m not sure what it really does/did. It would have been nice to know how much or how thick to apply it. It made me very sensitive on my cheek bone area, and I’ve never considered myself to have sensitive skin before. I wouldn’t buy it again. But it’s worth a laugh if you are having a ladies spa night.
customer_reviews.author: G's mama

customer_reviews.title: First time use...
customer_reviews.text: My first time use of this maSl was ok so far. When I first put it on it immediately started to bubble up. After covering my whole face it started to tingle and burn a little, but I guess that happens when you use stuff for the first time. I didn’t have no trouble taking it off. Afterward my face looked smooth and clear. And after you add the moisturizer, it feels super fresh and clean. I gave it a three out of five because of the burning cessation but I will give another review after a couple of tries
customer_reviews.author: sarai

customer_reviews.title: Milky Piggy Carbonated bubble clay will tickle your senses
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is so much fun. It works great, if you can handle the bubbles tickling your face! The hardest part is leaving it on long enough for it to work. It just looks like gray clay mask. It comes with a little spatula to apply it to your face. I really recommend that you use the spatula, or you will be scrubbing clay out of your nails for days. I love the packaging, it's adorable. I just wish there was a sticker with english instructions. everything was in korean, so we just kind of guessed.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Fun product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this mask after seeing lots of positive reviews, saying it helped to clear their skin and was fun to use. Almost as soon as it came, I took it into the bathroom to try it out. It foamed up so much that I looked like a cloud, which was cool, but as for clearing my pores- not so much. :/ Maybe it was just my skin type, but I didn't find it as effective as I hoped, even after multiple uses (I'm a combination skin type btw).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Nothing cleans my skin like elizavecca products. This and the hell pore mask destroy my pores like nothing else. I’ve bought this foaming mask several times and will keep buying it!! There’s so many dupes out now for foaming masks, but this one was here first and is the best. Don’t waste your time on the others!! This smells good and tickles, but your face feels so clean after. It’s like a vacuum for your skin.
customer_reviews.author: jessi & sky

customer_reviews.title: Definitely works !!
customer_reviews.text: I saw a pop up ad for this on Facebook and decided to give it a try.. it's great! It does bubble the way it claims to and after one use I did notice that my skin was softer and felt very clean.. I didn't have a breakout of any kind so not sure how well it works on that but wanted to know so I got my 13 year old to try it.. he breaks out on his nose and chin so that's where I put it on him and after a couple of uses his skin showed definite improvement and he had fun trying it...lol.. I would recommend this !
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Hollis

customer_reviews.title: Wowza
customer_reviews.text: Wow! It foams just like the pictures and feels amazing!!!! I would add to be sure you leave room around your eyes and nose bc it will foam up really big! My face is so clean and tight and my nose blackheads reduces in just one use. Certainly not a miracle— eat right and drink lots of water— but oh my gosh this will leave your skin looking and feeling amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Aranci

customer_reviews.title: Fun and mostly effective
customer_reviews.text: I have an extremely stressful job, so I purchased this as a way to pamper myself in addition to reduce the amount of stressed-induced acne. Well, it definitely succeeded in helping me to reduce my stress! After the 5 minutes was up after applying the mask, I looked in the mirror and cracked up! It is a super fun mask. It tickles your face, and makes it feel tighter after you rinse it off. After a few uses, I haven't noticed a reduction in the size of my pores, but I haven't gotten any new pimples! 4 stars for fun and some success, just wish it would clear out these blackheads and shrink my pores like I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: Tara S.

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I really like how bubbly it makes my face! The only problem is sometimes its hard to wash off and I have to scrub a bit to get it out of the creases of my face. Leaves my skin feeling soft and matte!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best deep cleaner around!
customer_reviews.text: My first product like this & it was kinda weird & great. I feel like it got my skin the cleanest its ever been. I dont feel like it was moisturizing, BUT, I used it 2 days ago & my face feels amazing (I followed this with the collagen jella mask that you let absorb in). With the seasons beginning to change my skin tends to be greasy & I feel like this mask deep cleaned & really helped with oil as I have not been oily at all. Really happy with all the Elizavecca products Ive tried & I love that you can scratch a code, scan the QR & validate that each product is authentic
customer_reviews.author: kbelladona1

customer_reviews.title: Fine enough. Mostly entertaining.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t see a huge difference in my skin after I used this product. It bubbled up some, but not a whole lot. My face felt fresh and clean, but it wasn’t some life-changing thing like other skincare items I have tried. It was fun to use and to watch the bubbles show up a little bit. It didn’t burn or leave any redness. I will most but something else when I run out. I can see this as being more for teenagers having a slumber party more than anything.
customer_reviews.author: g.

customer_reviews.title: Left a rash
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to try this product for no particular reason. I don’t have any skin issues other than I’m a bit on the dry side. Applying was pretty easy but once it started to bubble is when I felt uncomfortable, the bubbling around my nose made me want to sneeze .washing it was a bit of a mess, some got in my eyes, then When I looked at my skin I had a bunch of red dots, figured I’d give it some time to subside but the next day it’s clear that this product gave me a rash.
customer_reviews.author: Alina

customer_reviews.title: Overhyped crap
customer_reviews.text: I'm embarrassed to say, I fell for the hype. What a jar if crap. Thankfully it's not expensive. But if I can save someone from wasting their money, I will!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Allgeyer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a funny, interesting experience. This goes on just as other clay masks. It starts to dry pretty quickly and then the foaming starts. It foams and foams. I suggest using the spatula or something else (spoon for example) to get the mask out of the tub. I found putting my fingers into the tub made the product in the tub fizz up too. You need very little of this because a little bit goes a long way. This means that although the spatula is kind of awkward to use, it works fine. After using it my face felt tighter and cleaner and much more smooth. I will certainly use it again.
customer_reviews.author: apoem

customer_reviews.title: Cute, novelty "skincare"
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it actually does anything, but it feels good and doesn't irritate my oily, acne-prone, sometimes sensitive skin. Plus, it's fun :) I like to use it in the shower a couple times a month. In my experience, it takes a while to rinse off, and whenever I try rinsing in the sink I just make a huge mess! It makes my skin feel fresh. I think it claims to clear pores (?) but I'm not sure if it truly accomplishes more than a pleasant sensation. Remember, your mileage may vary! Check the ingredients for anything that might upset your skin. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: vanessamonstarrr

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: The best thing I love about this mask is the smell. It just smells so clean. It is also really gentle and leaves the skin feeling clean, moisturized, and soft. The only con I have is that for the first few minutes of wearing the mask, it can feel itchy because of all the bubbling, but once I got used to that, It was fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a fun skin care product
customer_reviews.text: ​After I had laughed myself silly looking into the mirror, I really appreciated this product. It came in a cute box, and the applicator is a real help. It is a fun skin care product, and while I can't attest to it removing blackheads, it did leave my skin smooth and silky after application. I plan on adding this as a mask into my skin care routine. The bubbling is a unique aspect and while unsure of its purpose I did enjoy watching it doing its thing. It is a little tricky to remove as it foams like soap. Overall, a great 'novelty' skin care item
customer_reviews.author: S.Viruly

customer_reviews.title: Fun but Ineffective
customer_reviews.text: This mask was fun to use. I do not believe it has any particular effect on my skin, but it gave me a good laugh. It's very... "slimy" is too negative... gloopy? It's as if there is a gelatin-like textural component in the mask. It isn't unpleasant so much as strange. My mom could only keep it on for a few minutes before the bubbling sensation drove her nuts, but I find it fine. In the end, I would not purchase this again since I don't see any different in my skin, but it's fun and makes me smile.
customer_reviews.author: LindsayRoseEliz

customer_reviews.title: I loved the mask altogether
customer_reviews.text: I loved the mask altogether. The bubbling effect was amusing and I loved the way my skin felt afterwards. I didn't like how careful you have to be to not activate the carbonation with the spatula. If you don't thoroughly wipe the spatula after use before getting more product it will cause the product inside the tub to carbonate. They do warn against that though. Product arrived well packaged in a timely manner and although the box was in another language they did take the time to print instructions in English and place those on the box.
customer_reviews.author: S. Christie

customer_reviews.title: So fun and great!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe how nice this mask turned out to be. You apply it with the mini spatula it comes with, and slowly it starts to foam up. After a few minutes I wet my fingertips and started rubbing the foam down into my skin. It felt weird at first because for a minute there I couldn't get the product off my face, but once I started to wash it away it came right off. My skin felt tight after and I applied my toner with no weird reaction. My skin also appeared nice and bright so I'm very satisfied with this!
customer_reviews.author: MMM

customer_reviews.title: It tickles and it’s kind of funny. My son just stared at me like „mom ...
customer_reviews.text: I saw a review on Facebook about it and thought I should give it a try. It’s a mask that will tickle your skin while it goes to work. Just put in on with the little spatula and watch how it starts to bubble up. It tickles and it’s kind of funny. My son just stared at me like „mom it’s getting more and more“ The instructions say to put it on and leave it for 5 minutes. After that you should use wet hands and massage it for another 2 minutes. I have baby soft skin now. I know I shouldn’t touch it but I can’t 😂 I highly recommend it and will buy more as christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Defective?
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if I received a defective product or fake. I've used this stuff before and I like it a lot. However what I received today doesn't even foam up at all, not even a little bit. It smells the same so I'm thinking it's not fake but it just doesn't work. One star for now unless someone reaches out to me.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: If you get the right product it is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I previously ordered this product and absolutely loved it. So I decided to buy another to give as a gift. What I recieved though was a sleep mask. As in a batman type sleep mask. When I called Amazon to have them fix the problem they told me there was nothing they could do.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Buy this piggy!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this mask!! It looked so weird at first since it went on so smoothly & well not bubbly but the more you leave it on the more the bubbles rise. A little tough to rinse off so I use a cloth but feel so fresh after
customer_reviews.author: Molly McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Interesting mask!
customer_reviews.text: I think this mask is more fun than it is something to actually be used practically. The bubbles definitely tickle while the mask is on and it did leave my skin feeling soft, though my friend doing it with me said he skin felt dry (she has more sensitive skin than me). Again, this is a fun mask to do with friends, but I definitely don't think it's life changing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is unbelievably worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for fun but then was so impressed by the cleansing power of this mask. Unused mask touches like gel and after it bubbled, you can play with it and massage it to a very sticky, mud textured mask. Althogh taking a long time to wash it off, my face was literally glowing after the first use! Never felt so clean! Also it smelled artificial but I still love the smell. Can't imagine how can I live without it.
customer_reviews.author: Meowlie

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed using this bubbly mask. All of the labels and directions were in Chinese. I found that if I left it on for 10 minutes it dried out my skin. But, leaving it on for 5 minutes was great! The bubbles were fun. Like any mask it's a pain to wash off, but not more so than any other brand I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Katie HTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: My face feels so clean and looks about 5x brighter!!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't really bubble though. More like a foaming effect. I was only able to keep it on for a 2 minutes because I put it on too thick and the foam started trying to drip into my eyes. After I washed it off, my face felt very clean. It also looked a lot brighter. It did seem a little dry, so I just added 3 small drops of oil to my skin and when I woke up, my skin looked better than it had in YEARS!!! No joke! I'm not sure if it was the clay mask or the combination of both but I will definitely continue to use this product as long as it's working!!
customer_reviews.author: Allie101

customer_reviews.title: Bought for laughs but loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I saw this product being shared online due to how silly it looks when it bubbles up, but I was so pleasantly surprised by how awesome it works! It comes with a little plastic applicator you use to scoop the product out and apply to your face. Don't place it too close to your nose and of course eyes as it bubbles up a lot! After it finishes bubbling (and you take pictures because it looks hilarious) you rub it in and use a wet washcloth to wipe it off. It leaves my skin extra soft feeling.
customer_reviews.author: K. Cannady

customer_reviews.title: Works well but feels itchy / awkward
customer_reviews.text: This product does a great job of making my skin look clear, bright, and my pores look smaller but the itchy feeling of actually having this on while it bubbles up on your face is the reason why I won’t purchase again . A huge part of the reason why I do masks is for relaxation so I don’t really want to feel irritated and I can easily find a clay mask that does the same thing minus the itchinesss.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations.
customer_reviews.text: I'll admit, I was totally skeptical before trying this product. From the moment I began the application, I was in love! With having both dry (mostly around my nose) and oily (mostly my chin and my forehead between my eyebrows) skin, its difficult to find a product to tackle enlarged pores without also worsening another issue. If this sounds like you, PLEASE give this particular mask even the slightest chance. About a week ago I was living with the acceptance of me just inheriting some dermalogical trifecta, leaving me without any actual chance at a remedial treatment. This. Is. It.. ..Oh, and my fiance swears by it as well!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Boyle

customer_reviews.title: VIP
customer_reviews.text: I use this mask constantly. It sucks all the gunk out of your pores, the bubbles are super fun, it smells incredible, and it's cheap AF. Everyone who has come to my house has tried this and loved it at some point. I would recommend removing it with a wet towel because it can be kind of stubborn but it's 100% worth making the extra effort. I'm on something like my 3rd jar now.
customer_reviews.author: Rory Gephart Leahy

customer_reviews.title: Very cool product. I’d tell my friends to try it
customer_reviews.text: Product comes sealed. I spread product on my face quickly. As it began to dry it lightened in color then became fluffy and foaming. The longer it was on the more it foamed. It tingles and tickles your pours as it expands. It is messy to wash off and you’ll want to wash it off in the shower. You do have to wipe a lot of get it to rinse off your face. Afterwards my face feels tighter and dry. It does not moisturize your face but rather dries it
customer_reviews.author: B-Riley

customer_reviews.title: I thought it might be fun for them to use at a sleep-over party
customer_reviews.text: Very strange mask! I think the appeal is the carbonation as I don't feel that I get any actual benefits from using this mask. I will say the carbonation makes it very difficult to endure keeping the mask on for any length of time. It give you a tickling / itchy feeling that makes it hard to resist touching your face. I've packed it up as a gift for my friend's pre-teen daughter. I thought it might be fun for them to use at a sleep-over party.
customer_reviews.author: Midge

customer_reviews.title: No blackheads removed
customer_reviews.text: It's fun, that's about it. Bought it for removing blackheads purpose but it removes none. It's also super difficult to wash it off completely. I have to wash my face 2, 3 times to make sure there's no residue left. Lots of reviewers claim that it makes their skin smooth but it makes my skin dry..........hmm so why am I giving it more than 1 star? I guess it's....fun! LOL
customer_reviews.author: fi66fi

customer_reviews.title: Yeah, it's okay
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, it's okay. The first time it didn't work, but I blame that to the fact that my face was kind if wet. I haven't seen that much of an improvement, but it feels good and I like to wear it for relaxing. Extremely hard to take off
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Faircloth

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun mask. I have no idea what is in it. The directions are not in English. Pretty self-explanatory, smear it on wait 10-15 minutes rinse. It's really weird because your face will bubble up like you have a bubble beard. It's kinda thick and sticky too, but not in a bad way. Leaves my skin soft, but I enjoy the bubble sensations. I love this goop
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not an exfoliate but baby soft!
customer_reviews.text: The bubbles!!! I've been wanting the carbonated bubble clay mask for awhile and finally saw it on amazon and gave in. Goes on smooth then u can hear and feel the bubbles form. After 5 mins, rub it in, and then rise. While rubbing in it starts to form more bubbles. I think I applied too much because u only need a thin layer. I love the way my skin feels. Super smooth especially on my nose but it doesn't take out any dry acne scaring the way exfoliating scrubs do. Will definitely use this once a week if my skin needs some baby softness.
customer_reviews.author: Mjenkins

customer_reviews.title: Im a happy piggy patron
customer_reviews.text: If you suffer from redness and little hard bumps on your face even after you showered and scrubbed your face, this mask helps greatly! I always had a red face but after about a week of using thing mask my redness has greatly diminished AND some of my wrinkles have calmed down. Moisturizers respond better too. I had the Bad Mother Foamer before and it is garbage anyway but especially in comparison to this one. Korean stuff seems to be better all the time anyway especially skin care and food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great...the first time
customer_reviews.text: After each use you'll have to stir it to get the mixture to foam on you. The excess skin oils from dipping back in (even after wiping your tool after each dip) settle on top and kill the foaming action. It does have a faint, odd smell but isn't too bad.
customer_reviews.author: MARIAH R CANTERBURY

customer_reviews.title: very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: i LOVE THIS SO MUCH. so i work early mornings and by the time i get home my face has just had it for the day. i have used my bubble clay mask a few times now ( i got it recently) and it literally lights my face up, and makes me feel really soft and glory after. first time you open it though it will look like some product(tiny bit off the top, nothing crazy)is missing, but i think that is a regularl occurence for Korean and other Asian beauty products.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: I have used it twice since I got it. The first time I used the product my skin felt a burning sensation. I quickly rinsed my face. The second time I applied it on my face I felt the burning sensation again and washed it off and I got rashes...I trashed the product immediately.
customer_reviews.author: SBM

customer_reviews.title: Fun clay mask
customer_reviews.text: This mask is so fun and left my skin feeling refreshed! It's a tingly sensation as the mask goes from clay to a fluffy consistency. I wish the applicator was a little wider or softer so it could bend, I will probably apply with my fingers next time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this mask twice and so far I love it. I have acne scars and enlarged pores and blackheads and after 2 uses I can already notice a difference in the appearance of my skin. My pores look smaller already and the blackheads are clearing already. I have used everything on my face including proactiv and nothing works on my pores. I LOVE this mask it looks so funny and the only downside is that it's very itchy as it's bubbling but otherwise I recommend to anyone looking for results!
customer_reviews.author: jb107711

customer_reviews.title: Fun, unique mask. Good for a laugh, at least. :)
customer_reviews.text: Worth it to just see it puff up. Not sure if it does anything to your skin that is beneficial but it's really hilarious to see your face get all fluffy. When we opened the box though, the mask had leaked out of the container and was kind of a mess which sucked because it was a gift and it looked kind of cheap since it leaked. Luckily it was just my own daughter so I don't really need to impress her. lol She loved the mask and I loved watching her get all puffy!
customer_reviews.author: D. Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this! Kind of strange sensation as it gets into every pore (somewhere between tickle and itch), but really does a great job getting your skin squeaky clean. Even though my skin is not oily and currently live in dry place, this is good for summer, beach, vacations to humid climates and camping - really gets every ounce of sunscreen off your skin, limited chance of breakouts. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Blevins

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to the hype
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those products you have to try to believe. I am a huge Korean skin care convert, and I thought I would try this gem out because of the reviews, and it doesn't disappoint! Be aware that this will pull out any impending pimples you might have, so afterwards you might have a few spots that weren't there before, but with regular use it keeps your pores nice and clean so the pimples won't be there! So when you see those bad Larry zits, it's a good sign it's doing its job! (I just wouldn't use this the night before a big event or presentation or something unless you have used it a few times!)
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M Briggs

customer_reviews.title: ... have never really known what a tickle would feel like on my face until i tried out this product
customer_reviews.text: I have never really known what a tickle would feel like on my face until i tried out this product. It's so much fun and makes my face feel clean and soft afterwards. I ran around my house the first time I tried it because the tickling sensation on your face is so different and you can see the foam form on your face like a shield. My boyfriend thought I was lying about the tickling until he tried it too. HA, but he agrees that his skin incredibly clean and soft afterwards and we now use this product at least once every couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great carbonation!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this due to all of the comments I heard on the internet about it. It comes nicely packaged with a little tool to spread she mask on your face. I washed my face and started to apply the mask. Only a few seconds later did it start to foam....and boy does it foam! It feels a little bit tingly due to the air bubbles. I let it sit for about ten minutes and then rinsed it off. It takes longer than I expected to remove it but left my face feeling soft. I only wish there were directions in English.
customer_reviews.author: apmfl

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: Ingredients listed on this listing is Ingredients green tea extract, aloe vera leaf extract, matcha powder, charcoal powder, pomegranate extract, fermented soy extract, alantoin, peony root extract, oregano leaf extract, white willow peel extract, portulaca extract, cinnamon extract BUT what I received was not this product. I believe I received their older version which I purposefully chose not to purchase. The expiration date on the box for this item did not match the expiration date on the item itself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you are wanting something fun to do with your kids
customer_reviews.text: If you are wanting something fun to do with your kids.....this is it! We had a mini spa night at our house and even the hubby wanted to get involved! I was concerned because I have VERY sensitive skin but didn't have any issues after using this product. My skin felt soft and clean. My kids (2 girls, 15 & 13, and 1 boy, 9) had the BEST time with this mask. This isn't something I would use all the time.....but I am happy with this purchase and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but not the most effective
customer_reviews.text: This is a really fun face mask to do and doesn't irritate my skin at all, but I don't notice it having too many results. I feel like my skin is slightly more moisturized after using it, but it doesn't do much to clear up my acne flare ups. This is definitely a fun face mask, especially to do with friends, but I'd recommend something different if you're looking for drastic results.
customer_reviews.author: Gwenith A.

customer_reviews.title: Great! Brings everything to surface.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this, however, it was hard to keep on since it tickled as it foamed up. It is messy, so I used it right before I showered and washed it off in there. I noticed my skin was soft afterwards and a lot of my blemishes came to the surface the next morning. I had a couple of fresh whiteheads that surfaced so... I wouldn't use this the first time if you have a big date the next day :p The only reason I gave it four stars was because it was messy and I thought I would get a larger container of product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Not again...
customer_reviews.text: My skin felt a burning sensation really bad.. I don’t have sensitive skin either. After I wash it off, an hour later, my skin felt super oily! I normally have oily skin but this made it 10x’s worse. Don’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: MCHAOCHAO

customer_reviews.title: Great mask face is very clean afterwards
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time purchasing, and I love this stuff! It bubbles up and cleans the pores really well, but my face does not feel extremely dry afterwards. It’s helped my acne too which is a bonus! I will definitely be buying again and keeping this on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Lori W.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because it seemed fun and like it would help my skin. First of all, I have semi sensitive skin and this turned my face bright red after 5 minutes. I could only use it on my nose and forehead without it doing damage. I’ve had this mask for a while now and it stopped bubbling after about a month. Kind of a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Mankin

customer_reviews.title: I have dry skin that occasionally breaks out with 1-2 ...
customer_reviews.text: I have dry skin that occasionally breaks out with 1-2 pimples on my cheek or forehead. I was worried that a clay mask would make my skin dryer, but it actually leaves my skin feeling very smooth and refreshed. Since receiving my mask in the mail, I use it once a week after work and leave it on for about 15-20 minutes. I let it completely bubble first (which yes, tickles a lot) and then rub it in and allow it to completely dry before showering. Since using I haven't had any breakouts and have made it a part of my weekly beauty routine.
customer_reviews.author: LittleBob

product_meta.title: Elizavecca Milky Piggy Carbonated Bubble Clay Mask
product_meta.description: Elizavecca milky Piggy carbonated bubble clay mask is a bubble Mud pack that provides pore cleaning and black head removal.
feature_bullets: Black Head Removal exfoliating pores pack

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
